==========
field_name
==========

.. py:attribute:: field_name

**domain**: server

**language**: python

:doc:`Field class </refs/server/field_api>`

Description
===========

Specifies the name of the field as referenced in code.
Use ``field_name`` to refer to the field in code.

See also
========

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`

:doc:`Fields </programming/data/fields>`

:doc:`field_caption <at_field_caption>`
